name: A Blob and his Box (bitmagine Studio)
name_original: A Blob and his Box (bitmagine Studio)
description:
Enter a fast-paced adventure of precision platforming and physics.
Join Fintch in his adventure in the temple of Zeela and get all the treasures that he hides inside.

FEATURES:

  • Great pixel-art graphics with a peculiar black & white style.
  • Much more than a PRECISION platformer game.
  • Game mechanics that hooks from the first moment.
  • Each chamber of the temple will force you to think about your next move.
  • Available languages: English and Spanish.
  • Meet Fintch, our new and charismatic hero, who will make you spend unforgettable moments.

.
